name: Swix Economy Waxing Table
categories: Ski wax stands, vises and tables
description: A waxing table that with slots for mounting cross-country ski profiles. The compact design is ideal for shorter ski lengths and snowboards.One leg is height adjustable.Removable table top is made of wood.Slots for mounting 2 sets of Swix cross-country waxing profiles.Also works with a pair of ski vices.Table top dimensions are 96 x 45 cm. Height is 83cm.
